title: {{silvery|More Wristblades}}
description:
Adds new wristblades at every tier, inserts them into the encounter tables, and gives them a custom tile.

Are they too overpowered? Yes, but they're awesome!

The following items are included in this mod:
- Desert Wristblade
- Steel Wristblade
- Carbide Wristblade
- Folded Carbide Wristblade
- Fullerite Wristblade
- Crysteel Wristblade
- Flawless Crysteel Wristblade
- Zetachrome Wristblade
- Vibro Wristblade
- Gaslight Wristblade
author: {{zetachrome|RandyKnapp}}
